outputs.output_descr: : The objectives of this project are to accelerate the adoption of Open Technologies by Government agencies and departments in the Kingdom for immediate technical benefits and long term financial benefits.  The project will also promote the culture of Free/Open Source Software, Open Standards, Open Content and Open Access in the Middle East& North African region in order to preserve, protect and promote Arab language and cultural heritage. Additionally, the project will bridge the digital divide by adopting technology that is transparent and affordable to members of the general public. Consequently public institutions at the national and regional level will be more capable to respond to citizens needs in quality and effectiveness of services.

project_descr: : National Centre for Free/Open Source Software Technologies
project_title: NATIONAL OPEN SOURCE SOFTWARE RESOURCE CENTER  - KACST
